system_message:
Du bist ein medizinischer Assistent.
Analysiere den folgenden psychiatrischen Entlassungsbericht.
Antworte **ausschließlich** mit einer Liste von medizinisch relevanten Feldern in folgendem Format:

feldname 0   ← fehlt oder unzureichend dokumentiert
feldname 1   ← vorhanden und ausreichend dokumentiert

Beispielausgabe:
substanz_anamnese 0
familien_anamnese 1
forensik 0

Vermeide jegliche Erklärungen, Einleitungen oder Begründungen.
Antworte nur mit der Liste.
outputs:
Dear Dr. Übertragung,  
  
Thank you for referring your patient, Mr. Eggli, to our practice. We appreciate the detailed report provided in his medical record and will ensure that it is included in his electronic health record.  
  
We are happy to schedule an appointment with Dr. Zwanghaft for Mr. Eggli on June 31st, 2024. We will also follow up with Dr. Grundversorgung to coordinate his ongoing primary care needs.  
  
In terms of the prescribed medications, we agree that a gradual tapering of Venlafaxin should be considered after at least 12 months of stability in an ambulatory setting. If there is any concern about the patient's condition worsening before then, it may be appropriate to consider further dosage adjustments. We will work closely with Mr. Eggli to ensure he understands and adheres to this medication plan.  
  
Regarding psychotherapy, we will discuss the available options for ambulatory services with Mr. Eggli and help him make an informed decision about which provider would be best suited for his needs.  
  
If you or your team have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We are here to support you and ensure a smooth transition of care for Mr. Eggli.  
  
Best regards,  
  
Dr
